27:26: And over them that did the work of the field for tillage of the ground was Ezri the son of Chelub:
27:27: And over the vineyards was Shimei the Ramathite: over the increase of the vineyards for the wine cellars was Zabdi the Shiphmite:
27:28: And over the olive trees and the sycamore trees that were in the low plains was Baalhanan the Gederite: and over the cellars of oil was Joash:
27:29: And over the herds that fed in Sharon was Shitrai the Sharonite: and over the herds that were in the valleys was Shaphat the son of Adlai:
27:30: Over the camels also was Obil the Ishmaelite: and over the asses was Jehdeiah the Meronothite:
27:31: And over the flocks was Jaziz the Hagerite. All these were the rulers of the substance which was king David's.
27:33: And Ahithophel was the king's counselor: and Hushai the Archite was the king's companion:
27:34: and Abiathar: and the captain of the king's army was Joab.
28:3: You shall not build a house for my name
28:5: he has chosen Solomon my son to sit on the throne of the kingdom of Yahweh over Israel.
28:7: if he be constant to do my commandments and my ordinances
28:8: in the sight of all Israel
28:11: and of the houses of it
28:12: for the courts of the house of Yahweh
28:13: and for all the work of the service of the house of Yahweh
28:14: for all vessels of every kind of service; [of silver] for all the vessels of silver by weight
28:15: and for the lamps of it
28:16: for every table; and silver for the tables of silver;
28:20: Be strong and of good courage
28:21: there are the divisions of the priests and the Levites
29:2: and the silver for the [things of] silver
29:3: because I have set my affection on the house of my God
29:5: and of silver for the [things of] silver
29:6: and the princes of the tribes of Israel
29:7: and of silver ten thousand talents
29:8: under the hand of Jehiel the Gershonite.
29:12: and you rule over all; and in your hand is power and might; and it is in your hand to make great
29:16: all this store that we have prepared to build you a house for your holy name comes of your hand
29:20: Now bless Yahweh your God. All the assembly blessed Yahweh
29:21: and offered burnt offerings to Yahweh
29:22: and anointed him to Yahweh to be prince
29:23: and prospered; and all Israel obeyed him.
29:25: and bestowed on him such royal majesty as had not been on any king before him in Israel.
29:26: Thus David the son of Jesse reigned over all Israel.
29:27: and thirty-three [years] reigned he in Jerusalem.
